question.title: Error "The requested version (2016-11-15) of service AmazonEC2Internal does not exist"
question.body:
I have migrated the AWS SDKs (ec2, s3, sts, cloudformation and all) v1.x to 2.x in my springboot project.

After that migration, all things went fine but for ec2 related service, I am facing the following error:

The requested version (2016-11-15) of service AmazonEC2Internal does not exist

in my src/resources/api_models/ec2/2016-11-15, using apiVersion as 2016-11-15.

Is there any new apiVersion available for AWS SDK 2.x?

{
  "version":"2.0",
  "metadata":{
    "apiVersion":"2016-11-15",
    "endpointPrefix":"ec2",
    "protocol":"ec2",
    "serviceAbbreviation":"Amazon EC2",
    "serviceFullName":"Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud",
    "serviceId":"EC2",
    "signatureVersion":"v4",
    "uid":"ec2-2016-11-15",
    "xmlNamespace":"http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2016-11-15"
  },

question_comments.body: Are you using the AWS Official Java SDK or a Spring AWS Java which is not the AWS Official Java SDK. Put a Code Example in your thread so community can see exactly what you are doing
